Greenville.E. W. Montgomery Cotton Warehouse: E. W. Montgomery Cotton Warehouse, also known as the Greenville Bonded Cotton Warehouse, is a historic cotton warehouse located in Greenville, South Carolina. The original section was built about 1928. Following the property's purchase in 1933 by Edmund Warren Montgomery, a significant cotton merchant and broker in upstate South Carolina from the early-to-mid-20th century, three additions were completed.
